rule-5-13-a.test_description: Building is located in climate zone 4A and includes a space that has residential occupancy type and is  conditionedbased on heating capacity of the HVAC system that servies the parent zone. The baseline floor U-factor for the zone is established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline floor assemblies must  match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-9
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline heating and cooling capacities are established correctly (air-side HVAC rule TBD). This affects baseline space conditioning categories

rule-5-14-a.test_description: Baseline slab-on-grade assemblies were modeled using "layers" method

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions shall conform with assemblies detailed in Normative Appendix A
standard.rule_description: Baseline slab-on-grade assemblies must conform with assemblies detailed in Appendix A ( unheated slabs from tables (A6).)

rule-5-14-b.test_description: Baseline slab-on-grade assemblies were not modeled using "layers" method

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions shall conform with assemblies detailed in Normative Appendix A
standard.rule_description: Baseline slab-on-grade assemblies must conform with assemblies detailed in Appendix A ( unheated slabs from tables (A6).)
